bill.title: An Act To Address Severe and Ongoing Shortfalls in the Funding of Direct Care Workers in Long-term Care Settings and To Establish the Commission To Study Long-term Care Workforce Issues
bill.description: An Act To Address Severe and Ongoing Shortfalls in the Funding of Direct Care Workers in Long-term Care Settings and To Establish the Commission To Study Long-term Care Workforce Issues

history.action: Committee on HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES suggested and ordered printed REFERENCE to the Committee on HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
The Bill was REFERRED to the Committee on HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES.
In concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
Reports READ
Senator BRAKEY of Androscoggin moved to ACCEPT the Minority Ought Not to Pass Report.
On further motion by same Senator TABLED until Later in Today's Session pending his motion to ACCEPT the Minority Ought Not to Pass Report,
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Taken from the table by the President
Subsequently The Minority Ought Not To Pass Report ACCEPTED
Roll Call Ordered Roll Call Number 279 Yeas 18 - Nays 14 - Excused 3 - Absent 0
Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
Reports READ.
On motion of Representative HYMANSON of York, TABLED pending ACCEPTANCE of Either Report.
Later today assigned.
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Speaker laid before the House
Subsequently, Representative HYMANSON of York moved to ACCEPT the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report.
On motion of Representative ESPLING of New Gloucester, TABLED pending the motion of Representative HYMANSON of York to ACCEPT the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report.
Later today assigned.
Speaker laid before the House
Subsequently, the Majority Ought to Pass as Amended Report was ACCEPTED.
The Bill was READ ONCE.
Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) was READ.
On motion of Representative PERRY of Calais, House Amendment "A" (H-514) to Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) was READ and ADOPTED.
Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-514) thereto was ADOPTED.
Under suspension of the rules, the Bill was given its SECOND READING without REFERENCE to the Committee on Bills in the Second Reading.
The Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-514) thereto.
In NON-CONCURRENCE and sent for concurrence.
ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.

On motion by Senator BRAKEY of Androscoggin The Senate RECEDED and CONCURRED With ACCEPTANCE of The Majority Ought to Pass As Amended Report AND  PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) AS AMENDED BY  House Amendment "A" (H-514) in concurrence
Representative GOLDEN of Lewiston REQUESTED a Roll Call. More than one-fifth of the members present expressed a desire for a roll call, which was ORDERED.
On further motion of same Representative TABLED pending PASSAGE TO BE ENACTED.
Later today assigned. (Roll Call Ordered)
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Unfinished Business
Speaker laid before the House

On motion of Representative HYMANSON of York, under SUSPENSION of the rules, the House RECONSIDERED its action whereby the Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-514) thereto.

On further motion of the same Representative, under further SUSPENSION of the rules, the House RECONSIDERED ADOPTION of Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-514) thereto.
On further motion of the same Representative, under further SUSPENSION of the rules, the House RECONSIDERED ADOPTION of House Amendment "A" (H-514) to Committee Amendment "A" (S-186).
On motion of Representative HYMANSON of York, House Amendment "A" (H-514) to Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) was INDEFINITELY POSTPONED.
On further motion of same Representative House Amendment "B" (H-529) to Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) was READ and ADOPTED.
Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "B" (H-529) thereto was ADOPTED.
Subsequently, The Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) as Amended by House Amendment "B" (H-529) thereto.
In NON-CONCURRENCE and sent for concurrence.
ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.

On motion by Senator BRAKEY of Androscoggin The Senate RECEDED and CONCURRED With PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (S-186) AS AMENDED BY  House Amendment "B" (H-529) in concurrence
PASSED TO BE ENACTED.
Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
On motion by Senator HAMPER of Oxford PLACED ON THE SPECIAL APPROPRIATIONS TABLE pending ENACTMENT in concurrence
CARRIED OVER to any Special or Regular Session of the 128th Legislature pursuant to Joint Order SP 601.
CARRIED OVER to any Special Session of the 128th Legislature pursuant to Joint Order SP 748.
In possession of the Senate when the Senate ADJOURNED SINE DIE and PLACED IN THE LEGISLATIVE FILES (DEAD).
